column4: hi, I'm trying to install mythtv following a set of instructions, and they tell me to "Log out from your current X session, and log back in as the mythtv user. At this point, do not open a "sudo -i" shell; we want the following command to be run using the mythtv user: mythtv-setup".......How do I run the command from the user mythtv? do I just run "mythtv-setup" from the terminal or what?
I am assuming there is really a user called "mythtv" user.
If so, you should be able to type in the username "mythtv" and the password for that user at the login screen
I am sorry, I did not. Yes, that is what I think you need to do
